altername_name: Logic Mahjong Souryuu - Yonin Uchi, Sannin Uchi
name: Logic Mahjong Souryu: 3-Player Version
overview: Logic Mahjong Souryu is a mahjong game that features 16 different characters to choose from and different kind of mahjong styles (Edit mode, Debug mode, Free Play Mode & Story Mode). The game features also a story mode in which the player takes the role of a mahjong player and the story will advance defeating different players in mahjong games.
